downloadTitle: Microsoft Visio 2010 and SharePoint 2010 Extensions for System Center 2012
downloadDescription: Enable Visio diagram to integrate current health state from System Center 2012 - Operations Manager

downloadFile.name: Visio 2010 and SharePoint 2010 Extensions for System Center 2012.zip
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/6/8/b/68bf2693-325b-4992-830b-9283564884bb/Visio 2010 and SharePoint 2010 Extensions for System Center 2012.zip

detailsSection:
This Visio 2010 Add-in will enable diagrams to show health states of System Center 2012 - Operations Manager managed objects within the Visio diagram. This live health state functionality is available both when viewing the document in Visio 2010 and in SharePoint 2010.

Feature Summary
  • Open exported Operations Manager distributed application diagrams in Visio
  • Associate Visio shapes to objects in Operations Manager
  • Poll for health updates on the relevant Operations Manager objects to update the health state as shown in Visio
  • Insert icons from Operations Manager into Visio

  • 4/1/2012 - Initial release for System Center 2012, version 2.0
detailsSection_file_name: Visio 2010 and SharePoint 2010 Extensions for System Center 2012.zip
systemRequirementsSection:
• Other Software:
    • Visio 2010 Premium and (optionally) SharePoint 2010 Enterprise
    • System Center 2012 - Operations Manager
